## Quality Checklist

Please confirm the following:

- [ ] Resource is publicly accessible
- [ ] Documentation is clear and complete
- [ ] Resource is maintained or is timeless reference material
- [ ] No duplicates exist in the awesome list
- [ ] Description follows formatting guidelines (see CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Entry is placed in alphabetical order within its category
- [ ] Description is accurate and not exaggerated
- [ ] Resource is directly relevant to WEKAOU
